channel.title: Characters are nulling
channel.description:
Alright I searched everywhere, but nowhere have I found a solution to this problem.
Basically, everytime my old players try to login they cant move and the login message spams until they are disconnected. This is including my main owner account. If i create a new account it works fine, but any account that was existing when this problem happened is messed up.
I also found that if I made a new account that was working fine, but then added one of the nulled accounts to my friends list the new account would start nulling.
I tried saving the character files in a separate folder, deleting all the ones in the server files, then replacing them with the saved ones, but the same thing started happening agian.
I really have no idea what the hell is going on, and some help here would be GREATLY appreciated.

item.title: Characters are nulling
item.dc:creator: @Brigz Brigz
item.description:
@Brigz wrote:

tb:

Make sure they are using the correct client that co-respawns to that source so it doesnt mess up. If it still happens meaby either the source or client has an error/bug. Try compiling and if it has an error fix it.

Wow… Great insight. Nevermind you people are no help.

Read full topic

item.title: Characters are nulling
item.dc:creator: @tb1 tb
item.description:
@tb1 wrote:

Make sure they are using the correct client that co-respawns to that source so it doesnt mess up. If it still happens meaby either the source or client has an error/bug. Try compiling and if it has an error fix it.

No, I didn’t add or change 1 thing. And why the fuck would you think that there is a tutorial for this. You’re retarded. And getting a new source is the easy solution
